unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore - Grab 'em While They're Hot!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore - Grab Them While They Are Hot!**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally ditching that cramped Mumbai chawl for your own piece of paradise? Well, you're in luck! Banks are practically throwing home loan schemes at you these days.
normalised: Thinking of finally ditching that cramped Mumbai chawl for your own piece of paradise? Well, you are in luck! Banks are practically throwing home loan schemes at you these days.

unnormalised: SBI is boasting rates starting at a ridiculously low 6.7%, while HDFC is promising quick approvals for first-time homebuyers. Even smaller players like Bandhan Bank are joining the party, offering special deals for women borrowers. Dr. Sharma, a real estate guru from Delhi, says, "It's a borrower's market right now!"
normalised: S B I is boasting rates starting at a ridiculously low six point seven percent, while H D F C is promising quick approvals for first-time homebuyers. Even smaller players like Bandhan Bank are joining the party, offering special deals for women borrowers. Doctor Sharma, a real estate guru from Delhi, says, "It is a borrower's market right now!"

unnormalised: But hold your horses, folks! Don't jump in without doing your homework. Read the fine print, compare the processing fees (some are daylight robbery!), and figure out what EMI you can actually afford.
normalised: But hold your horses, folks! Don't jump in without doing your homework. Read the fine print, compare the processing fees (some are daylight robbery!), and figure out what E M I you can actually afford.

unnormalised: Remember that dream 2BHK in Powai? You might actually be able to snag that 800 sq ft apartment with these sweet schemes. And with Diwali around the corner, expect even MORE offers to flood the market. Happy house hunting, folks! Letâ€™s hope interest rates stay low!
normalised: Remember that dream two B H K in Powai? You might actually be able to snag that eight hundred square foot apartment with these sweet schemes. And with Diwali around the corner, expect even more offers to flood the market. Happy house hunting, folks! Let us hope interest rates stay low!

unnormalised: Rs. 50,000 can go a long way in a new home!
normalised: Rupees fifty thousand can go a long way in a new home!
